message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a competitive price considering its value, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still confident that the product's value is higher than $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $875000. This is a fair price considering the product's unique features and benefits.

I understand your position, Alice. I respect the value you place on the product. Given my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $860000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering our previous discussions.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $880000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $870000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $865000. I believe this is a reasonable price given our previous negotiations.

I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $875000. This is the final price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs.

I understand your position, Alice. I respect the value you place on the product. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $870000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise given our previous negotiations.
